name: @cam/shopify-theme-tools
description: CLI and importer for syncing NPM packages into Shopify themes

scripts.import:help:
echo "Usage:
  npm run import         → Import updated files
  npm run import:clear   → Clear cache and re-import all
  npm run import:help    → Show this help message"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
